trends: There have been no other sightings in New Point
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was at an outside party we were sitting around the campfire talking. when lisa said she seen a very unusual light, she was sure it was a satellite she said they come by every 18 min. and if we watched for it would be around again. lisa kept watching the sky while we all went back to conversation. about 10 to 15 min. lisa screamed look or something to that effect and pointed at sky. i looked up and immediately seen a huge metorite going across the sky and cover way more sky then any shooting star i have ever seen. i seen it go across about a 1\3 of sky it was smaller than an asperin at arms length. ed said he seen it too. kevin and cathey missed it proable because there backs were somewhat turned to it and they were getting tired. lisa seen the most, i asked were it started and she pointed toward nw horizen and it travet to se horizen. it traveled in a arc. i asked ed what time it was he said 12:20, the party started saturday and went into sunday am. i seen a mostly white light. lisa was able to describe in better detail. it appeared to be a fantastic sighting of a fairly large meteorite. 2 weeks later heavy flooding from 10 inches of rain! weeks earlier earthquakes in indiana. and last fall i seen and reported a high speed ufo making a question mark shape trail. how unusual? david
